main event: A witness observed 3 unidentified objects in the night sky above Denver, Colorado on 6 October 1967.
interesting points: The objects were described as reddish-orange with a mostly orange coloration and slightly fluorescent appearance., The observed shapes resembled a baseball and were seen in a definite triangular formation., The sighting lasted between 8 to 12 seconds in total., A retired Navy Lieutenant Commander reported the sighting and characterized the movement as faster than any jet aircraft., The sound during the observation described as a not loud but definite humming after the objects had passed.
